import {useContext} from 'react' import Modal from '../UI/Modal/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import CartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const Cart = props=>{ const cartCtx= useContext const cartItems=
    {[{id:'c1', name:'Mixed Fried Rice',amount:2,price:299.55}].map(item=>
  • {item.name}
    • )}
return {cartItems}
